title: Collaborative Code Editor Widget for Automerge
text: Open multiple browser windows real-time collaboration.
code: library(shiny) library(automerge) library(autosync) library(autoedit)  server <- amsync_server(port = 3030, host = "127.0.0.1") server$start()  doc_id <- create_document(server) doc <- get_document(server, doc_id) am_put(doc, AM_ROOT, "text", am_text("")) am_commit(doc, "init")  ui <- fluidPage(editor_output("editor"))  shiny_server <- function(input, output, session) {   output$editor <- render_editor(editor(server$url, doc_id)) }  onStop(function() server$stop()) shinyApp(ui, shiny_server)

title: Collaborative text editor widget — editor
text: server_url WebSocket URL (ws:// wss://) sync server. doc_id Document ID (base58check encoded). timeout Connection timeout milliseconds. Default 10000. width, height Widget dimensions.

title: Collaborative text editor widget — editor
text: widget connects specified sync server synchronizes CodeMirror 6 editor Automerge document. Multiple users can edit document simultaneously automatic conflict resolution. Automerge document must "text" field type Automerge text (created automerge::am_text()). Shiny applications, current editor content available input value input$<outputId>_content.
